title: Ticket #529: Acting on large numbers of jobs makes schedd unresponsive
description:
When the schedd has a large number of jobs in the queue, actions taken on those jobs can make the schedd unresponsive for long periods of time. Today, I observed BNL removing 28000 jobs at once (cleanup from #528). The procedure took 28 minutes to complete, during which time the schedd didn't do anything else. Its ad aged out of the collector and all connections to it went unanswered.

BNL has observed the same behavior occurring when the schedd evaluates the periodic policy expressions on all the jobs in the queue. The schedd was unresponsive for over 6 minutes while evaluating the periodic expressions.

It would be nice if the schedd could remain responsive during these long actions.
